title: Did the Republicans vote to make it legal to prevent gays and lesbians from adopting?
subtitle: In the party ' s vote, the Republican majority in the House of Representatives ' Appropriations Committee approved an amendment to a funding bill allowing federally funded adoption agencies to discriminate against LGBT families.
author: David Emery
vclaim: The Republican majority voted in the House of Representatives Appropriations Committee to approve an amendment allowing adoption agencies financed by taxpayers to deny families of LGBT persons.
